ygData.subject: Re: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Geez, I hope it isn t just through training.  There s like 4 specialization slots right? Thats 4 * 50 = 200 trains.  Then you want to specialize in the
ygData.messageBody:
>guildmaster. Whether it goes up through use or solely through
>training I do not know, but the patch message seemed to suggest
>
>Kaela

Geez, I hope it isn't just through training. There's like 4 specialization
slots right?
Thats 4 * 50 = 200 trains. Then you want to specialize in the
specializations and
thats probably like another 50.

Azboklin
